def count_matches(N, S, lengths):
    c = 0
    S += 1
    ans = 0
    for i in lengths:
        ans += c == S
        c = (c + i + N) % N
    ans += c == S
    return ans

def count_matches(N, S, lengths):
    c = 0
    S -= 1
    ans = 0
    for i in lengths:
        ans += c == S
        c = (c + i + N) % N
    ans -= c == S
    return ans
